references.name: Michał Zielonka
references.reference: I need to say that Bartosz is a quick learner. In three months he learned more than anyone else on my path. Not afraid of new challenges, always on time, even working at night to get things done. For sure we will work together in future projects. This guy is really worth recommendation.

references.name: Marcin Chudy
references.reference: Bartosz is an excellent software engineer with a truly unique personality. Hard-working, open-minded and a true Agile evangelist. He always tries to find the best solutions possible in any project he is working on. During the time we had the chance to work together, he managed to build a great team and highly improve the internal development processes.

references.name: Jakub Szczepanik
references.reference: We were working with Bartosz on several projects. Every time we've had problems or were struggling with any issue he always knew what to do. When You work with Bartosz You see that there are no impossible stories to implement, only the hard ones. I can also tell that he is a quick learner. When we had to use a new framework it took him a few days to learn it and introduce the whole front-end team to new technologies. Always open minded and joyful.

references.name: Aleksandra Dąbrowska
references.reference: Bartosz is a committed employee who quickly becomes an expert in a field of interest. He is a natural leader who takes responsibility for the work of the whole team. In addition to performing well in programming tasks, it also takes into account the business value of new functions and analyses the impact of the feature on the rest of the system. He is a passionate, who devotes himself entirely to new projects and tries to conclude them carefully. I recommend working with Bartosz, because his effectiveness, commitment and conscientiousness are a guarantee to the project's success.
